Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.GUI

Class GenericPopupController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.GUI.Controller
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.GUI.GenericPopupController
public class GenericPopupController
extends Controller
Class that represents the controller of the GenericPopup page of the game This page is used to represent a generic text popup that will contain a message following a certain action

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane genericPopup
    Attribute that represents the central pane of the page
    javafx.scene.control.Button okButton
    Attribute that represents the button to confirm the view of the popup and close it
    javafx.scene.text.Text title
    Attributes that represent the text where the message of popup is shown
